 if n==0:

 n=n-1

n,a =input().split()
a=int(a)
s=str(n)
#print(type(s[len(s)-1]))
while(a>0):
 if(s[len(s)-1]=="0"):
  s=s[:len(s)-1]
 else:

 a=a-1

na = list(map(int,input().split()))
n = na[0]
a = na[1]

n = str(n)
n = list(map(int,n))
for i in range(a):
 if n[-1] == 0:
  n.pop()
 else:
  n[-1] -= 1

print(int(''.join(list(map(str,n)))))
